What is JAVA?: Java is a programming language and a computing platform for application development. It was first released by Sun Microsystem in 1995 and later acquired by Oracle Corporation. It is one of the most used programming languages.
What is Program Counter?: Program counter instruction to be fetched for execution or address of the next byte hacjksdc which has not automatically get incremented automatically one by one as the instruction byte get fetched. Also program register keeps the address of next instruction.
